headline: Despite pushback, Montreal forges ahead with strict new short-term rental rules
summary: MONTREAL - Montreal is forging ahead with new rules banning many short-term rentals for nine months a year, hoping to alleviate a housing crunch and strike a blow in a lengthy battle against...

headline: Airbnb Would Be A Check-In, Save For Economic Concerns And Regulatory Headwinds
summary: Airbnb's strong balance sheet, diversification, and long-term rental focus make it attractive.

headline: In Spain, short-term rentals surge despite bid to rein in overtourism
summary: The supply of short-termrentals for tourists has jumped 25% in Spain over the last twoyears, a study by tourism lobby group Exceltur found, despitethe local governments' attempts to curtail them...

headline: 2 Profitable Stocks to Consider Right Now and 1 to Turn Down
summary: While profitability is essential, it doesn’t guarantee long-term success. Some companies that rest on their margins will lose ground as competition intensifies - as Jeff Bezos said, "Your margin is my opportunity".

raw.headline: 2 Profitable Stocks to Consider Right Now and 1 to Turn Down

headline: Airbnb Scams - New Book Explores Thriving Criminal Activity On Big Tech Platforms [analysis]
summary: Big tech sharing economy platforms like Airbnb and Uber are marketed as trustworthy, but a new book by a South African media scholar argues that they are highly vulnerable to scammers who spread...
